ProjectTitle: The path to to chemically recyclable polymers: catalytic synthesis of 1,3-dioxacycloalkanes and their controlled polymerization to high MW polymers
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/05/2023 [REDACTED] Please list the different types of experimental and processing data in different rows, that makes it easier to explain how to handle different data types later in the DMP, you don't have to list your own manuscripts and presentations. [REDACTED] preserving data on an external hard drive only is not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] depending on the requirements of the journal in which you publish you can also use a data repository such as RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) to publish your datasets, your data will get a DOI or other identifier that you list in your publication, but makes it easier for others to find your data independent of the publication, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
